mapper.select: select bang_no,bang_name,bang_limit_people,bang_cur_people,bang_memo,bang_money,bang_addr,bang_date ,(select gstring from bang b, gubunja gb WHERE b.bang_age = gb.gprotocol AND b.bang_no = 1)"연령대" ,(select gstring from bang b, gubunja gb WHERE b.bang_topic = gb.gprotocol AND b.bang_no = 1)"관심주제" ,(select gstring from bang b, gubunja gb WHERE b.bang_time = gb.gprotocol AND b.bang_no = 1)"시간대" from bang where bang_no=#{bang_no}
